Package storage

Storage backend to save and load extraction results.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigSaver
    This class saves the configuration to a file by closing the tool; and loads it back at a new start of the tool.
    FileStorageInterface
    Class to start Elasticsearch queries.
    GeneralStorage  
    MAPDBStorageInterface
    Class to start Elasticsearch queries.
    StringDump
    Utility class to dump Objects to string using reflection and recursion.

Package storage Description

Storage backend to save and load extraction results. Several storage mechanisms are available.
